== Wire Format ==

Emcaster uses a standard wire format that can be parsed in any language, on any platform.

== Message Format ==

Emcaster works with any messsage format. Messages are published as simple byte arrays. These bytes could be an xml document or a raw struct.

If you are publishing messages across languages or platforms, XML is usually a safe choice. A common approach is to define an explicit message contract with <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xsd">XSD</a>.

=== .NET XML ===
In .NET, the XSD tool can be used to generate classes to handle XML serialization.
